text: What is the penalty for not being ready to drive in the endurance at your designated time slot?

answer_options.answer_text: 10s penalty on the endurance time for each (following) time slot that is missed
2 min penalty on the endurance time
no penalty if the team is able to start their run at a later time slot, (e.g. at the end of endurance event)

answers.answer_text: 10s penalty on the endurance time for each (following) time slot that is missed
2 min penalty on the endurance time
no penalty if the team is able to start their run at a later time slot, (e.g. at the end of endurance event)

text:
Use the given linear single track model and parameters of a formula student vehicle to calculate the side slip angle áºž during skid pad (quasi static cornering).
 Assume the vehicle is driving on the centreline and the run time is 5.5 sec (no penalties). Calculation hints: use full precision for intermediate results and pi.
 ay is the lateral acceleration
 Answer: in degrees, round to 0.01

You have fitted your 4WD car with a 3-axis accelerometer and  have carefully aligned and zeroed it before the test session. In the data, you notice that at higher speeds the filtered z (vertical) acceleration drifts toward 0.98g but goes back when driving slowly.\n What could be going on?

answer_options.answer_text: You are experiencing aero balance shift and chassis pitch
Your sensor is mounted at an angle
Your suspension stiffens up at high speeds
Only driven wheels grow bigger at higher speeds, jacking up the rear
The car creates lift and therfore you measure a smaller g

answers.answer_text: You are experiencing aero balance shift and chassis pitch
Your sensor is mounted at an angle
Your suspension stiffens up at high speeds
Only driven wheels grow bigger at higher speeds, jacking up the rear
The car creates lift and therfore you measure a smaller g

text: What is not true for the business plan excutive summary?

answer_options.answer_text: The Executive Summary is part of the Business Presentation Judging
The name of the University must be given
A picture of the car has to be included
The number of the team has to be in the right top corner
The template for the UK business logic case can be used

answers.answer_text: The Executive Summary is part of the Business Presentation Judging
